title: An Italian family: life on a farm
creator_credit: John Barnes and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: This film presents geographic and cultural aspects of Italy with an account of one family living on a small farm, who, unlike many Italians seeking modernisation, avoid mechanisation in preference for a simple way of life. With collaboration by Edoardo Capolino.
